Directives > ui-tabs

ui-tabs

This is the content of my first div

some other content

And again.

Some further content

Yet more content to wrap onto a new line and a scrollbar also applied.
content for tab 2
content for tab 3

and again

 

<ui-tabs selected-tab="tab1" style="width: 300px; height: 200px;">
    <ui-tab-option id="tab1" title="Tab1">
        <div style="padding: 10px;">This is the content of my first div
            <p>some other content</p>
            <p>And again.</p>
            <p>Some further content</p>
            <p>Yet more content to wrap onto a new line and a scrollbar also applied.</p>
        </div>
    </ui-tab-option>
    <ui-tab-option id="tab2" title="Tab2">
        <div style="padding: 10px;">content for tab 2</div>
    </ui-tab-option>
    <ui-tab-option id="tab3" title="Tab3">
        <div style="padding: 10px;">content for tab 3
            <p>and again</p>
        </div>
    </ui-tab-option>
</ui-tabs>
